original_text:
Then the king returned and went as far as the Jordan.
Now the men of Judah had come to Gilgal to go out and meet the king and bring him across the Jordan.
korean_text: 왕이 돌아와 요단에 이르매 유다 족속이 왕을 맞아 요단을 건너가게 하려고 길갈로 오니라

sentences.original_text: and went as far as the Jordan.
Now the men of Judah had come to Gilgal
to go out and meet the king
and bring him across the Jordan.
